title: Vampiric Quinn
body:
With Halloween coming I thought it would be a great idea to have a vampire-themed skin for Quinn. Quinn is a seductive vampiress, and Valor is, of course, a bat. Doesn't need much explaining or any new animations.

What do you guys think?

replies.body: Lol what? It's February bro... idk what ur talking about
February comes before October. incase you didnt know....
This guy is bsing i think...
nope...looks like a legit good skin idea....very Halloween oriented.
Dude, i meant that this other guy thinks that its halloween in Feb....
does he though? did you ask him? or just guess off the fact he said halloween is coming? he didnt say it was coming SOON or even when it was coming...

Then why post this now?
It's just stupid to do that......
wait for halloween to come and then post it

understand that it takes a long time to make a skin.
understand that ideas come any time.
understand that posting this AT halloween would be completely pointless.
understand that posting this on OCE is completely pointless.

still a great idea. no reason for a bunch of stupid %%%%s putting OPs idea down just because its posted at a perfect time for it to count for this years halloween skin ideas.

to OP, post this on NA and send a support ticket so rito can actually see this really simple good idea for a halloween skin.
Sounds pretty cool and simple dude.
great skin idea, dont listen to all the %%%%%%s who dont understand that Halloween happens every year.

is Halloween coming?

Very cool idea tho XD

-GL,HF
yes, its an annual American event. last years Halloween already happened, and the next one is coming this year.
